1: -module(pubkey_policy_tree_SUITE).
    2: -compile([export_all, nowarn_export_all]).
    3: 
    4: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
    5: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
    6: 
    7: -define(PRE_SCRIPT, "<pre class=\"mermaid\">~n").
    8: -define(POST_SCRIPT, "~n</pre><script type=\"module\">import mermaid from 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/mermaid@10/dist/mermaid.esm.min.mjs';</script>").
    9: 
   10: %% -define(DEBUG, true).
   11: 
   12: -ifdef(DEBUG).
   13: -define(FWR(Fmt, Args),
   14:         begin
   15:             io:fwrite(user, "dbg: " ++ Fmt, Args)
   16:         end).
   17: -else.
   18: -define(FWR(Fmt, Args), ok).
   19: -endif.
   20: 
   21: -define(PAL_MMD(MMD),
   22:        begin
   23:            %% ?FWR("~s~n", [MMD]),
   24:            ct:log(MMD),
   25:            ?FWR("~n", [])
   26:        end).
   27: -define(ROOT_TN, pubkey_policy_tree:root()).
   28: -define(EMPTY_VPT, {}).
   29: -define(ROOT_PN,
   30:         begin
   31:             {AnyPolicyNode, _} = ?ROOT_TN,
   32:             AnyPolicyNode
   33:         end).
   34: -define(PN(VP), pubkey_policy_tree:policy_node(VP, [], [])).
   35: -define(PN(VP, EPS), pubkey_policy_tree:policy_node(VP, [], EPS)).
   36: 
   37: %% Note: trees used for testing below might not make much sense from
   38: %% RFC5280 perspective and can be improved for sure; but can be good
   39: %% enough for checking some general tree handling code
   40: 
   41: all() -> [add_leaves,
   42:           add_leaf_siblings,
   43:           all_leaves,
   44:           prune_leaves,
   45:           prune_tree_and_leaves,
   46:           constrained_policy_node_set,
   47:           valid_policy_node_set,
   48:           any_leaves,
   49:           prune_tree_shorter_branch,
   50:           prune_invalid_nodes].
   51: 
   52: any_leaves(_Config) ->
   53:     AL =
   54:         fun(Tree) ->
   55:                 pubkey_policy_tree:any_leaves(Tree)
   56:         end,
   57:     ?assertEqual([], AL(?EMPTY_VPT)),
   58:     log_tree_diagram("tree_with_any_policy_leaf()", tree_with_any_policy_leaf()),
   59:     ?assertEqual([?PN(?anyPolicy)], AL(tree_with_any_policy_leaf())),
   60:     log_tree_diagram("tree_with_any_policy_node1()", tree_with_any_policy_node1()),
   61:     ?assertEqual([], AL(tree_with_any_policy_node1())),
   62:     ok.
   63: 
   64: constrained_policy_node_set(_Config) ->
   65:     CS =
   66:         fun(Tree) ->
   67:                 pubkey_policy_tree:constrained_policy_node_set(Tree)
   68:         end,
   69:     ?assertEqual([], CS(?EMPTY_VPT)),
   70:     ?assertEqual([?PN(?anyPolicy)], CS(tree_with_any_policy_leaf())),
   71:     ?assertEqual([?PN("SILVER", ["A"]), ?PN("GOLD")], CS(tree_with_any_policy_node1())),
   72:     ?assertEqual([?PN("GOLD", ["GOLD", "SILVER"])], CS(tree_with_any_policy_node2())),
   73:     ok.
   74: 
   75: valid_policy_node_set(_Config) ->
   76:     VS =
   77:         fun(Tree) ->
   78:                 pubkey_policy_tree:valid_policy_node_set(Tree)
   79:         end,
   80:     ?assertEqual([], VS(?EMPTY_VPT)),
   81:     log_tree_diagram("tree_with_any_policy_leaf()", tree_with_any_policy_leaf()),
   82:     ?assertEqual([?PN("GOLD")], VS(tree_with_any_policy_leaf())),
   83:     log_tree_diagram("tree_with_any_policy_node1()", tree_with_any_policy_node1()),
   84:     ?assertEqual([?PN(?anyPolicy), ?PN("SILVER", ["A"]), ?PN("GOLD")],
   85:                  VS(tree_with_any_policy_node1())),
   86:     log_tree_diagram("tree_with_any_policy_node2()", tree_with_any_policy_node2()),
   87:     ?assertEqual([?PN(?anyPolicy), ?PN("GOLD", ["GOLD", "SILVER"])],
   88:                  VS(tree_with_any_policy_node2())),
   89:     ok.
   90: 
   91: prune_invalid_nodes(_Config) ->
   92:     Children0 = [{?PN("GOLD"), [?PN("GOLD")]},
   93:                  {?PN("BLUE"), []}, % policy_tree_node type terminating branch - pruning target
   94:                  ?PN("SILVER")], % leaf of policy_node type
   95:     Tree0 = {?ROOT_PN, Children0 ++
   96:                  [{?PN("GOLD"), [?ROOT_PN]}]},
   97:     Tree0 = pubkey_policy_tree:prune_invalid_nodes(Tree0, []),
   98:     {ok, Tree1} = explain(Tree0,
   99:                           [{prune_invalid_nodes, [[?PN("SILVER")]]},
  100:                            {prune_invalid_nodes, [[?PN("BLUE")]]},
  101:                            {prune_invalid_nodes, [[?PN("GOLD")]]}]),
  102:     ?EMPTY_VPT = Tree1,
  103:     %% prune node
  104:     Tree2 = {?ROOT_PN, Children0 ++
  105:                  [{?PN(?anyPolicy), [?ROOT_PN]}]},
  106:     {ok, Tree3} = explain(Tree2,
  107:                           [{prune_invalid_nodes, [[?PN("SILVER")]]},
  108:                            {prune_invalid_nodes, [[?PN("BLUE")]]},
  109:                            {prune_invalid_nodes, [[?PN("GOLD")]]},
  110:                            {prune_invalid_nodes, [[?PN(?anyPolicy)]]},
  111:                            {prune_invalid_nodes, [[?ROOT_PN]]}]),
  112:     Expected = {?ROOT_PN, [{?PN(?anyPolicy),
  113:                             [?ROOT_PN]}]},
  114:     ?assertEqual(Expected, Tree3),
  115:     ok.
  116: 
  117: prune_leaves(_Config) ->
  118:     NullVPT = pubkey_policy_tree:empty(),
  119:     ?assertEqual(NullVPT, pubkey_policy_tree:prune_leaves(NullVPT, null)),
  120:     Tree0 = {?ROOT_PN,
  121:              [{?PN("GOLD"), [?PN("GOLD"), ?PN("GOLD2")]},
  122:               {?PN("GOLD"), [?PN(?anyPolicy), ?PN(?anyPolicy)]}]},
  123:     {ok, Tree} = explain(Tree0, [{prune_leaves, ["GOLD"]},
  124:                                   {prune_leaves, [?anyPolicy]}]),
  125:     ?assertEqual({?ROOT_PN,
  126:              [{?PN("GOLD"), [?PN("GOLD2")]},
  127:               {?PN("GOLD"), []}]}, Tree),
  128:     ok.
  129: 
  130: prune_tree_and_leaves(_Config) ->
  131:     Tree0 = {?ROOT_PN,
  132:              [{?PN("SILVER", ["SILVER"]),
  133:                []},
  134:               {?PN("GOLD", ["GOLD"]),
  135:                [?PN("GOLD", ["GOLD"])]}]},
  136:     Instructions = [{prune_tree, []},
  137:                     {prune_leaves, ["GOLD"]}],
  138:     {ok, Tree} = explain(Tree0, Instructions),
  139:     Expected = {?ROOT_PN,
  140:                 [{?PN("GOLD", ["GOLD"]), []}]},
  141:     Expected = Tree,
  142:     ok.
  143: 
  144: prune_tree_shorter_branch(_Config) ->
  145:     %% shorter branch ending with leaf is not expected to be pruned
  146:     Tree0 = {?ROOT_PN,
  147:           [{?PN("GOLD"), [?PN("GOLD")]},
  148:            ?PN("SILVER")]},
  149:     Instructions = [{prune_tree, []}],
  150:     {ok, Tree0} = explain(Tree0, Instructions),
  151:     ok.
  152: 
  153: all_leaves(_Config) ->
  154:     Tree1 = {?ROOT_PN,
  155:              [{?PN("GOLD"),
  156:                [{?PN("GOLD"), []},
  157:                 {?PN("SILVER"), [?PN("GOLD"), ?PN("SILVER")]}]},
  158:               {?PN("SILVER"),
  159:                [{?PN("GOLD"), []},
  160:                 {?PN("SILVER"), [?PN("GOLD"), ?PN("SILVER")]}]}]},
  161:     log_tree_diagram("Tree1", Tree1),
  162:     ?assertEqual([?PN("GOLD"), ?PN("SILVER"), ?PN("GOLD"), ?PN("SILVER")],
  163:                  pubkey_policy_tree:all_leaves(Tree1)),
  164:     ok.
  165: 
  166: add_leaves(_Config) ->
  167:     RootTree = pubkey_policy_tree:root(),
  168:     AddLeavesFun1 =
  169:         fun(_) -> [?PN("GOLD"), ?PN("SILVER")] end,
  170:     AddLeavesFun2 =
  171:         fun(#{valid_policy := "SILVER"}) ->
  172:                 [?PN("GOLD"), ?PN("SILVER")];
  173:            (_) ->
  174:                 []
  175:         end,
  176:     Instructions = [{add_leaves, [AddLeavesFun1]},
  177:                     {add_leaves, [AddLeavesFun1]},
  178:                     {add_leaves, [AddLeavesFun2]}],
  179:     {ok, Tree} = explain(RootTree, Instructions),
  180:     ?assertEqual({?ROOT_PN,
  181:                   [{?PN("GOLD"),
  182:                     [{?PN("GOLD"), []},
  183:                      {?PN("SILVER"), [?PN("GOLD"), ?PN("SILVER")]}]},
  184:                    {?PN("SILVER"),
  185:                     [{?PN("GOLD"), []},
  186:                      {?PN("SILVER"), [?PN("GOLD"), ?PN("SILVER")]}]}]},
  187:                  Tree),
  188:     ok.
  189: 
  190: add_leaf_siblings(_Config) ->
  191:     AddLeavesFun1 =
  192:         fun(_) -> [?PN("GOLD"), ?PN("SILVER")] end,
  193:     AddLeavesFun2 =
  194:         fun(#{valid_policy := ?anyPolicy}) ->
  195:                 [?PN("PINK")];
  196:            (#{valid_policy := "SILVER"}) ->
  197:                 [?PN("PURPLE")];
  198:            (_) ->
  199:                 []
  200:         end,
  201:     Instructions = [{add_leaf_siblings, [AddLeavesFun1]},
  202:                     {add_leaf_siblings, [AddLeavesFun1]},
  203:                     {add_leaf_siblings, [AddLeavesFun2]}
  204:                    ],
  205:     {ok, Tree} = explain(tree_with_any_policy_node1(), Instructions),
  206:     ?assertEqual({?ROOT_PN,
  207:                   [{?PN(?anyPolicy),
  208:                     [?PN("GOLD"), ?PN("GOLD"), ?PN("SILVER"), ?PN("GOLD"), ?PN("SILVER"), ?PN("PINK")]},
  209:                    {?PN("SILVER", ["A"]),
  210:                     [?PN("SILVER", ["B"]), ?PN("GOLD"), ?PN("SILVER"), ?PN("GOLD"), ?PN("SILVER"), ?PN("PURPLE")]}]},
  211:                  Tree),
  212:     ok.
  213: 
  214: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  215: %% Internal API
  216: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  217: explain(InitTree, Instructions) ->
  218:     ct:log("=============================================~nSTEP: 0)"),
  219:     ct:log("Instructions=~n~p", [Instructions]),
  220:     ?PAL_MMD(to_mmd("0) Initial tree", InitTree)),
  221:     explain(InitTree, Instructions, 1).
  222: 
  223: explain(Tree, [], _) ->
  224:     {ok, Tree};
  225: explain(Tree0, [{FunctionName, Args} | Rest], N) ->
  226:     Title = io_lib:format("~p) pubkey_policy_tree:~p()", [N, FunctionName]),
  227:     ct:log("=============================================~nSTEP: ~s", [Title]),
  228:     Tree = apply(pubkey_policy_tree, FunctionName, [Tree0 | Args]),
  229:     ?PAL_MMD(to_mmd(Title, Tree)),
  230:     explain(Tree, Rest, N+1).
  231: 
  232: log_tree_diagram(Title, Tree) ->
  233:     ?PAL_MMD(to_mmd(Title, Tree)),
  234:     ok.
  235: 
  236: to_mmd(Title, Tree) ->
  237:     ct:log("Diagram input tree~n~p", [Tree]),
  238:     {NodeInfo, Arrows} = traverse(Tree),
  239:     ?PRE_SCRIPT ++
  240:         "---~ntitle: " ++ Title ++ "~n---~n" ++
  241:         "flowchart TD~n" ++
  242:          NodeInfo ++ "~n" ++ Arrows ++ "~n"
  243:         ?POST_SCRIPT.
  244: 
  245: traverse(TreeNode = {_PolicyNode, _NoChildren = []}) ->
  246:     Path = [1],
  247:     NodeId = nid(Path),
  248:     ?FWR("Node (no children): ~p~n", [lists:reverse(Path)]),
  249:     {"", io_lib:format("~s~s~n", [NodeId, node_desc(NodeId, TreeNode)])};
  250: traverse(TreeNode = {}) ->
  251:     Path = [1],
  252:     NodeId = nid(Path),
  253:     ?FWR("NULL tree: ~p~n", [lists:reverse(Path)]),
  254:     {"", io_lib:format("~s~s~n", [NodeId, node_desc(NodeId, TreeNode)])};
  255: traverse(Tree) ->
  256:     traverse(Tree, [1], {#{}, []}).
  257: 
  258: traverse(#{}, _Path, Acc) ->
  259:     ?FWR("Node (leaf found): ~p~n", [lists:reverse(_Path)]),
  260:     Acc;
  261: traverse({_Node, _NoChildren = []}, _Path = [1], _Acc = {NodeInfo0, Arrows}) ->
  262:     %% traverse end
  263:     ?FWR("END Node (no children): ~p~n", [lists:reverse(_Path)]),
  264:     NodeInfo = maps:fold(fun(K, V, Acc) ->
  265:                                  Acc ++ K ++ V ++ "~n"
  266:                          end,
  267:                          "", NodeInfo0),
  268:     {NodeInfo, Arrows};
  269: traverse({_Node, _NoChildren = []}, _Path, Acc) ->
  270:     ?FWR("Node (no children): ~p~n", [lists:reverse(_Path)]),
  271:     Acc;
  272: traverse(TreeNode = {PolicyNode, Children = [Child | Rest]}, Path, _Acc = {NodeInfo0, Arrows0}) ->
  273:     NodeId = nid(Path),
  274:     ChildId = nid([length(Children) | Path]),
  275:     Fmt = "~s --> ~s~n",
  276:     Args = [NodeId, ChildId],
  277:     Arrows1 = Arrows0 ++ io_lib:format(Fmt, Args),
  278:     NodeInfo = store_new_nodes([{NodeId, TreeNode}, {ChildId, Child}], NodeInfo0),
  279:     Acc2 = traverse(Child, [length(Children) | Path], {NodeInfo, Arrows1}), % traverse vertically
  280:     traverse({PolicyNode, Rest}, Path, Acc2). % traverse horizontally
  281: 
  282: store_new_nodes([], NodeInfo) ->
  283:     NodeInfo;
  284: store_new_nodes([{Id, Node} | Rest] , NodeInfo0) ->
  285:     NodeInfo = case maps:is_key(Id, NodeInfo0) of
  286:                    true ->
  287:                        NodeInfo0;
  288:                    false ->
  289:                        NodeDesc = node_desc(Id, Node),
  290:                        NodeInfo0#{Id => NodeDesc}
  291:                end,
  292:     store_new_nodes(Rest, NodeInfo).
  293: 
  294: node_desc(Path, {}) ->
  295:     io_lib:format("[\"(NULL) ~s\"]", [Path]);
  296: node_desc(Path, #{valid_policy := VP, expected_policy_set := EPS}) ->
  297:     io_lib:format("[\"(L) ~s\nvp: ~s\neps: ~s\"]", [Path, p(VP), ps(EPS)]);
  298: node_desc(Path, {#{valid_policy := VP, expected_policy_set := EPS}, _}) ->
  299:     io_lib:format("[\"(N) ~s\nvp: ~s\neps: ~s\"]", [Path, p(VP), ps(EPS)]).
  300: 
  301: nid(Path) ->
  302:     nid(Path, "").
  303: 
  304: nid([], Acc) ->
  305:     "N_" ++ lists:reverse(Acc);
  306: nid([Node], Acc) ->
  307:     nid([], Acc ++ integer_to_list(Node));
  308: nid([Node | Rest], Acc) ->
  309:     nid(Rest, Acc ++ integer_to_list(Node) ++ "-").
  310: 
  311: ps(ExpectedPolicySet) ->
  312:     [io_lib:format("~s ", [p(P)]) || P <- ExpectedPolicySet].
  313: 
  314: p(?anyPolicy) ->
  315:     "anyPolicy";
  316: p(P) ->
  317:     P.
  318: 
  319: tree_with_any_policy_leaf() ->
  320:     {?ROOT_PN,
  321:      [{?PN("GOLD"),
  322:        [?PN(?anyPolicy)]}]}.
  323: 
  324: tree_with_any_policy_node1() ->
  325:     {?ROOT_PN,
  326:      [{?PN(?anyPolicy),
  327:        [?PN("GOLD")]},
  328:       {?PN("SILVER", ["A"]),
  329:        [?PN("SILVER", ["B"])]}]}.
  330: 
  331: tree_with_any_policy_node2() ->
  332:     {?ROOT_PN,
  333:      [{?PN(?anyPolicy),
  334:        [{?PN("GOLD", ["GOLD", "SILVER"]),
  335:          [?PN("SILVER")]}]}]}.
